TopicTitle: We are aware of some trouble accessing the forum today.

Articles.Content:
Several forum members, and myself as well, experienced trouble logging into the forum today. We do not know the cause, but we have alerted our IT support about the matter. 

Sorry for any inconvenience this has caused.

We have also learned that some of you can read the forum but not reply, start PMs but not reply to them, and weirdnesses like that. We are sorry for the trouble and will try to get it fixed as quickly as we can.

There seems to be a bad caching server somewhere on the internet (one of those "akamai" things) truncating one of the files. It's still being looked into as far as I know, but thanks to @ManeTI for helping me set up this hosts file workaround: 

23.67.252.234   forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com

I believe that address is simply a different caching server that has been confirmed to work (it also has an "akamai" WHOIS entry), so it should be harmless to switch. (But it could cause problems later on if akamai shuffles their server addresses, so don't do it unless you're unable to use the forum otherwise.)

ManeTI says, 

Quote

Hi guys, please help me to troubleshoot here, clear your browser's cache and if you are using some ad-blocker, please disable it for a moment, just for the forum, thanks.
Just wanted to post here and say that clearing my cache worked on my posting issues.  Now I don't have to suffer with Edge anymore.  YAY!!!
Hello guys, the reply issue should be gone, please hard refresh the site (CTRL+Refresh) and try again.

While we are still here and the past problem is solved: loading my own forum profile, costs quite some time when I click on the picture or something like that. (about 7-8 seconds)
Loading other members profile is done in a second. 

Has this to do with that as owner of the profile you can edit, scrap, etc., things on your profile, or is it some kind of issue we are having lately?

6 hours ago, DrLicor said:

While we are still here and the past problem is solved: loading my own forum profile, costs quite some time when I click on the picture or something like that. (about 7-8 seconds)
Loading other members profile is done in a second. 

Has this to do with that as owner of the profile you can edit, scrap, etc., things on your profile, or is it some kind of issue we are having lately?

 

Thanks for reporting @DrLicor , I dont think it has something to do with that, we are going to investigate this.
@ManeTI, that's nice to hear. Let me know when you find something.

The chat issues do finally seem to be gone.  I know it was frustrating for me not to be able to make posts.

I did try clearing cache and disabling my adblock before.  It seemed to work sometimes.  I am glad the problem is corrected.  I was scratching my head and trying almost everything under the sun between myself and mod trying to fix the issue before he brought up this post.

Thank you, forum team, for getting things fixed.

Edited September 29, 2017 by Nittany Tiger
